author: Xbox
description:
This is Yooka-Replaylee, the remastered, remade, remixed version of Playtonic's 3D-platforming collectathon Yooka-Laylee. 

You play as Yooka, the charming green chameleon, and his fluffy little bat companion Laylee as you take on the corporate creep Capital B who is attempting to change the course of the universe by stealing all the Pagies to the One Book.

With a whole host of improvements, enhancements, brand new secrets and challenges hiding behind every corner, all sprinkled across a stunning and vibrant story book world displayed to you in beautiful 4K, we cannot wait for you to experience the definitive version of the favorite buddy-duo's very first adventure when it lands on Xbox Series X|S in 2025!

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/yooka-replaylee/9nvc8pg5fplc

author: Xbox
description:
Post Trauma is a modern-day survival horror puzzle game inspired by genre-defining classics, coming to Xbox Series X|S on March 31. You awaken to find yourself in a twisted reality full of mind-bending puzzles, breathtaking tension, and unspeakable nightmares. Will you find a way home?

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/post-trauma/9p3k5n1h0p08

*PC gameplay captured.
